title: Reproducible Data Science with R
text:
Welcome & Context

What is Reproducibility?

In data science, reproducibility refers to the ability to replicate results by following the same data and methods.
Essential for transparency, accountability, and validation of scientific results.

title: Reproducible Data Science with R
text:
Why does it matter?


It is the #1 skill-gap in the job market: 

Academia,
Industry,
Government, NGOs, etc.







Is there a REPRODUCIBILITY CRISIS in science?
A Nature survey with ~1,600 researchers found that

+70% failure rate to reproduce another scientist‚Äôs experiments
+50% have failed to reproduce their own experiments
Main causes: selective reporting, weak stats, code/data unavailability, etc.
